title: Patrick Croskerry
text: Patrick Croskerry (born 7 October 1942) is a Canadian <a href="rowing%20%28sport%29">rower</a>. He competed in the <a href="Rowing%20at%20the%201976%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20eight">men's eight</a> event at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>.
